self.name: reqDHParams
self.description: Request for the second step of Authorization key derivation process.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Request for the second step of Authorization key derivation process.

arguments.name: p
arguments.description: Big endian encoded first factor. Note - p < q

arguments.name: q
arguments.description: Big endian encoded second factor. Node - p < q

arguments.name: publicKeyFingerprint
arguments.description: Fingerprint of the RSA key that the client has chosen

arguments.name: encryptedData
arguments.description:
Encrypted payload, obtained as follows:
  • Let newNonce be a random 32-bit number
  • Let data be a serialization of either mtproto/p_q_inner_data or mtproto/p_q_inner_data_temp with the generated newNonce
  • dataWithHash = concat(sha1(data), data, random_bytes(235 - data.length))
  • encryptedData = dataWithHash ^ key.exponent % key.modulus, where key is the server public key which was chosen
